  Flexible Payment Options: The developer offer flexible payment terms and financing options, making it more accessible for potential investors to secure a unit in the development.



  Lifestyle and Security: Investing in Mantawi Residences provides an opportunity for a luxurious and secure lifestyle, attracting both residents and investors who prioritize comfort and safety.

            Semi-Furnished 2-Bedroom Condo Unit Available in Davao City  Note: Price listed is exclusive of VAT.  Parking Arrangements: Parking arrangement is a garage type of parking.  Furnishing: The unit is Semi-Furnished. The units come with painted walls, flooring tiles, and kitchen cabinets. Cabinets are installed inside the master bedroom and the unit comes with your very own induction cooker.  Location: The place is 15-25 minutes to some of the city's popular malls and recreational areas (namely Gaisano Mall, Abreeza Mall, and the Damosa District). To the Sasa Wharf, where boats can take passengers to the nearby Island Garden City of Samal, it's only a walking distance.  Facilities and Amenities: Seawind boasts of one of the most generous allocations for gardens, pools and other recreational spaces. It also has commanding, unobstructed views of the Davao Gulf and Samal Island, creating a "resort-like" vibe. So, instead of concrete, residents are surrounded by greenery and leisure.  Living Amenities: Living amenities include the clubhouse and the pool, parks and pocket gardens, a multi-purpose basketball court, a commercial strip with its own terminal, and the administration office.  Building Amenities: Building amenities include two elevators and two stairs, an emergency power provided for the main entrances and elevators, centralized waste disposal, CCTV cameras are set up in every entry and exit points, a 24-hour security on stand-by at the main gate.  Available now or Available on...: The condo unit is available NOW.  HLURB LTS No. 031692 Turnover Date: February 2016 (2-Bedroom)

                                                <div class="SeoText is-paddingless" data-contenteditable="true"
                 id="pathseo-new-texts" data-clpurl="/condominium/buy/"></div>
                <div class="SeoText is-paddingless"
                        id="pathseo-new-texts">
                            <h2 style="text-align: justify;"><strong>Condos For Sale: Vertical and Urban Living </strong></h2>

<p><img loading="lazy"alt="Condo for Sale Philippines" loading="lazy" src="https://static-ph.lamudi.com/url/bm9uZS9ub25l/10000x10000/jpg/cms/Condominium_Buy_1.jpg" style="float:right; margin-left:10px; border:2px solid #DDD" title="Condo for Sale Philippines" /></p>

<p>A house and lot is one of the items in many Filipinos’ bucket lists. Being family-oriented, Filipinos regard their homes as a venue for cultivating their children’s values, principles, and well-roundedness. Other than cultivating good character and morals, Filipinos prioritize convenience, security, and tranquility when seeking an ideal place to call home. </p>

<p>However, with today’s urbanization, the dynamics of an “ideal home” have changed significantly. Several residential developers offer a variety of sizes, styles, structures, and forms in their real estate developments. Other than houses and lots, property buyers can now choose from apartments, townhouses, houses and lots, and condominiums.</p>

<p>With spaces becoming more scarce in metropolitan areas, condo developments are space-efficient residential alternatives to houses and lots. Nowadays, it is hard not to pass by a condominium unit while you go around metropolitan areas such as Metro Manila.</p>

<p>That said, dynamic individuals and families looking to live in a cosmopolitan environment should look into a <strong>condo for sale</strong> to find their ideal vertical residence.</p>

<h2><strong>Where Can I Find Condos for Sale?</strong></h2>

<p>Metro Manila comprises 16 areas—15 cities and one municipality. The proliferation of several corporations and sectors in the capital metro spurs the development of condominiums in many areas. Interested buyers will find most condos for sale in central business districts, economic zones, and close to educational institutions.</p>

<p>In case you’re lost on where to search for suitable condominium candidates, here are some of the top hotspots that offer a <strong>condo for sale</strong>:</p>

<ul>
	<li>Quezon City</li>
	<li>Makati</li>
	<li>Taguig</li>
	<li>Pasig</li>
	<li>Manila</li>
	<li>Mandaluyong</li>
	<li>San Juan</li>
	<li>Muntinlupa</li>
	<li>Parañaque</li>
	<li>Las Piñas</li>
	<li>Pasay </li>
</ul>

<p>For buyers seeking condos outside of Metro Manila, some of the suitable cities to explore condominiums for sale are:</p>

<ul>
	<li>Cebu City</li>
	<li>Lapu-Lapu City</li>
	<li>Mandaue</li>
	<li>Davao City</li>
	<li>Baguio</li>
	<li>Angeles</li>
	<li>Bacolod</li>
	<li>Cagayan de Oro</li>
</ul>

<p>Wherever you purchase your condo, your future vertical home will be close to many establishments that make living in the city more convenient and bearable. Your future neighbors will be schools, educational institutions, shopping malls, marketplaces, clinics, hospitals, restaurants, and government offices.</p>

<p><img loading="lazy"alt="Live Beautifully and Comfortably" loading="lazy" src="https://static-ph.lamudi.com/url/bm9uZS9ub25l/10000x10000/jpg/cms/Condominium_Buy_2.jpg" style="float:left; margin-right:10px; border:2px solid #DDD" title="Live Beautifully and Comfortably" /></p>

<p style="list-style-type: disc;"> </p>

<h2 style="list-style-type: disc;"><strong>Average Selling Prices of Condos</strong></h2>

<p style="list-style-type: disc;">The condos for sale have prices on the affordable to the luxurious price segments. You can get a condo unit in prime locations for around Php 2 million. For more luxurious options, expect to shell out at around Php 12 million to Php 90 million.</p>

<p style="list-style-type: disc;">Condos for sale come with well-made amenities that promote safety, comfort, and leisure. Some amenities include swimming pools, spa facilities, function halls, landscaped gardens, outdoor play areas, fitness gyms, and activity courts. These amenities make purchasing condos a wise and excellent investment choice.</p>

<h2 style="list-style-type: disc;"><strong>Why Should You Invest in a Condominium?</strong></h2>

<p style="list-style-type: disc;">It may seem expensive to invest in a <strong>condo for sale</strong>, but your future investment entails perks. One is you’ll get to live in a metropolitan area where every bit of convenience and comfort is within arm’s reach. </p>

<p style="list-style-type: disc;">Second, your condo comes with amenities that reflect the vibes and experience of hotels and resorts. Who needs to fly away when you have your vacation awaiting you downstairs?</p>

<p style="list-style-type: disc;">Third, since most condos for sale are in metropolitan areas, future residents will enjoy a walkable environment. They’ll save themselves time from commuting while also exercising and enjoying the city surroundings.</p>

<h2 style="list-style-type: disc;"><strong>Investment Opportunities</strong></h2>

<p style="list-style-type: disc;">Future owners of the condos for sale may use their properties as investment sources. Let’s say they bought multiple units; they may live in one and rent out the others to students and professionals who want to live closer to their schools and workplaces. Others may also use their units as staycation suites. With pandemic restrictions easing, a comfortable and safe respite is essential to take care of their well-being.</p>

<h2 style="list-style-type: disc;"><strong>FAQs</strong></h2>

<h3 style="list-style-type: disc;"><strong><em>Are there any affordable 3-bedroom condos for sale below 5 million?</em></strong></h3>

<p style="list-style-type: disc;">Yes, there are <a data-mce-href="https://www.lamudi.com.ph/condominium/buy/price:2500000-5000000/bedrooms:3/" href="https://www.lamudi.com.ph/condominium/buy/price:2500000-5000000/bedrooms:3/">three-bedroom condos for sale below 5 million</a>. Although these condos are affordable, they still provide all the comfort and convenience you would expect from a condominium development.</p>

<h3 style="list-style-type: disc;"><strong><em>Are there any condos for sale with a balcony?</em></strong></h3>

<p style="list-style-type: disc;">Yes, you can find <a data-mce-href="https://www.lamudi.com.ph/condominium/buy/balcony/" href="https://www.lamudi.com.ph/condominium/buy/balcony/">condos for sale with a balcony</a> included. Balconies are desirable amenities that provide a great view of your neighborhood and excellent resale value in the long run.</p>

<h3 style="list-style-type: disc;"><strong><em>Are there any foreclosed condos for sale?</em></strong></h3>

<p style="list-style-type: disc;">Yes, there are <a data-mce-href="https://www.lamudi.com.ph/foreclosures/condominium/buy/" href="https://www.lamudi.com.ph/foreclosures/condominium/buy/">foreclosed condos for sale</a>. Since foreclosures sell below market value, they’re an affordable option for those who can’t afford the otherwise prohibitive prices of new properties.</p>

                    </div>

                </div>
